author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add an example to list cell IDs of a given wafer type

#### PR validation:

Tested with a cfg in the test directory of Geometry/HGCalGeometry

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

title: Phase2-hgx363Y Add an example to list cell IDs of a given wafer type
